author: jaz
msg: small change to allow ofbiz to compile again

author: woonsan
msg: With high load, an exception can occur like the following:

Problem Determination: Using statistics component should be done before invoking portletContent.complete*() methods in parallel rendering mode. AsyncPageAggregatorImpl waits for portlets to be completed and moves to rendering layouts, restoring the rendering mode to non-parallel. If the rendering mode of current worker context changes before invoking statistics component, then the statistics component cannot access request instance properly in parallel rendering mode.

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-1020: created basic tool to check an index, print details of each segment, and fix the index by removing broken segments

author: woonsan
msg: With high load, an exception can occur like the following:

Problem Determination: Using statistics component should be done before invoking portletContent.complete*() methods in parallel rendering mode. AsyncPageAggregatorImpl waits for portlets to be completed and moves to rendering layouts, restoring the rendering mode to non-parallel. If the rendering mode of current worker context changes before invoking statistics component, then the statistics component cannot access request instance properly in parallel rendering mode.
